member.name: T:BarRaider.SdTools.FilenamePropertyAttribute
member.summary: FilenamePropertyAttribute - Used to indicate the current property holds a file name. This will allow StreamDeck Tools to strip the mandatory "C:\fakepath\" added by the SDK

member.summary: PluginActionId attribute Used to indicate the UUID in the manifest file that matches to this class

member.summary: UUID of the action

member.name: M:BarRaider.SdTools.PluginActionIdAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor - This attribute is used to indicate the UUID in the manifest file that matches to this class

member.summary: Connection object which handles your communication with the Stream Deck app

member.summary: Event received by the plugin when the Property Inspector uses the sendToPlugin event.

member.summary: Event received when the user changes the title or title parameters.

member.summary: Event received when a monitored application is terminated

member.summary: Event received when a monitored application is launched

member.name: E:BarRaider.SdTools.SDConnection.OnDeviceDidDisconnect
member.summary: Event received when a device is unplugged from the computer

member.summary: Event received when a device is plugged to the computer.

member.name: E:BarRaider.SdTools.SDConnection.OnPropertyInspectorDidAppear
member.summary: Event received when the Property Inspector appears in the Stream Deck software user interface, for example when selecting a new instance.

member.name: E:BarRaider.SdTools.SDConnection.OnPropertyInspectorDidDisappear
member.summary: Event received when the Property Inspector for an instance is removed from the Stream Deck software user interface, for example when selecting a different instance.

member.summary: Persists your global plugin settings

member.summary: Sets the default image for this state, as configured in the manifest

member.summary: Shows the Alert (Yellow Triangle) on the StreamDeck key

member.summary: Shows the Success (Green checkmark) on the StreamDeck key

member.name: T:BarRaider.SdTools.SDWrapper
member.summary: * Easy Configuration Instructions: * 1. Use NuGet to get the following packages: * CommandLineParser by gsscoder * streamdeck-client-csharp by Shane DeSeranno * Newtonsoft.Json by James Newton-King * 2. Create a class that implements the IPluginable interface (which is located in BarRaider.SDTools), this will be your main plugin * 3. Pass the type of the class to the main function

members.member:
/************************************************************************ * Initial configuration from TyrenDe's streamdeck-client-csharp example: * https://github.com/TyrenDe/streamdeck-client-csharp * and SaviorXTanren's MixItUp.StreamDeckPlugin: * https://github.com/SaviorXTanren/mixer-mixitup/ *************************************************************************/
Obsolete! Use the new Run(string[]) overload Library's main initialization point. Pass the args from your Main function and a list of supported PluginActionIds, the framework will handle the rest.

member.name: M:BarRaider.SdTools.SDWrapper.Run(System.String[])
member.summary: Library's main initialization point. Pass the args from your Main function. We'll handle the rest
